description: Lists all of the flows associated with your account.

nested_items.name: flows
nested_items.description: The list of flows associated with your account.

nested_items.name: flowArn
nested_items.description: The flow's Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A user-entered description of the flow.

nested_items.name: flowName
nested_items.description: The specified name of the flow. Spaces are not allowed. Use underscores (_) or hyphens (-) only.

nested_items.name: flowStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates the current status of the flow.

nested_items.name: sourceConnectorType
nested_items.description: Specifies the source connector type, such as Salesforce, Amazon S3, Amplitude, and so on.

nested_items.name: sourceConnectorLabel
nested_items.description: The label of the source connector in the flow.

nested_items.name: destinationConnectorType
nested_items.description: Specifies the destination connector type, such as Salesforce, Amazon S3, Amplitude, and so on.

nested_items.name: destinationConnectorLabel
nested_items.description: The label of the destination connector in the flow.

nested_items.name: triggerType
nested_items.description: Specifies the type of flow trigger. This can be OnDemand, Scheduled, or Event.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: Specifies when the flow was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: Specifies when the flow was last updated.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The ARN of the user who created the flow.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedBy
nested_items.description: Specifies the account user name that most recently updated the flow.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: lastRunExecutionDetails
nested_items.description: Describes the details of the most recent flow run.

nested_items.name: mostRecentExecutionMessage
nested_items.description: Describes the details of the most recent flow run.

nested_items.name: mostRecentExecutionTime
nested_items.description: Specifies the time of the most recent flow run.

nested_items.name: mostRecentExecutionStatus
nested_items.description: Specifies the status of the most recent flow run.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token for next page of data.
